text: (nabiye! ovunta) oba mese pavasanu: “obage (his valata) udin ho nætahot obage padayanta yatin ho obata (yamkisi) vedanavak æti kirimata ho nætahot obava vividha samuhayan bavata pat kara, oba atare samaharek, samahareku samaga yuddha karana men (pat kara, emagin æti vana amarukama oba vindina lesata) patkirimatada ohu balasampannayeku vasayenma sitinneya”. ovun vataha gænima sandaha api (apage) ayavan kese nam vividha andamin (pæhædili kara) pavasannemudæyi oba avadhanaya kara balanu
